title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: My husband and I have been married for 18 years. We share a son — and my husband has a daughter. Why should they get an equal inheritance?
items.description: “This year she got married, and I was completely left out of any planning, bridal-shower and wedding activities.”

items.title: As banks retreat from DEI, Citi is making these changes to its diversity and hiring practices
items.description: Citigroup says it will no longer require “diverse slates of candidates and diverse panels of interviewers.”

items.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
items.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

items.title: ‘She’s bleeding her retirement dry’: My friend earns $9 an hour, but wastes money on vacations and massages. What can I do?
items.description: ‘She blew through her inheritance fast and paid for the down payment on her car with credit cards’

items.title: The iPhone 16e has one big drawback
items.description: The new device has all the bells and whistles we have come to expect.

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

items.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
items.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

items.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
items.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

items.title: ‘I feel like I’ve opened a hornet’s nest’: My mother-in-law lists my husband as beneficiary on her $1 million IRA. But her will says otherwise. Who wins?
items.description: “All of this is causing a lot of turmoil in the family. Does her will trump the IRA beneficiary?”
